name: GP Back To Top
author: Mai Dong Giang (Peter Mai)

sections.description:
With this plugin you can create Back To Top custom for the your website WordPress.
It’s very simple and easy to use. And alway FREE. Give me a cup of coffee if you can.
If you are hiring developer for coding website. Feeling free contact to me via gmail, skype.

Features

  • Create custom the scroll option.
  • Create custom scroll speed.

GP Back To Top plugin is created by Peter

Source code?

You can get GP Back To Top source code on my GitHub GP Back To Top
sections.installation:
1. Upload gp-back-to-top.zip to plugins via WordPress admin panel or upload unzipped folder to your wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> GP Back To Top to setting
sections.faq:
For any questions, error reports and suggestions please email giangmd93@gmail.com

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload gp-back-to-top.zip to plugins via WordPress admin panel or upload unzipped folder to your wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings -> GP Back To Top to setting
